description: '''Eric Alexander''' (born August 4, 1968) is an American [[jazz]] saxophonist, composer, and educator. Having placed second at the 1991 [[Thelonious Monk Institute of Jazz#Competitions|Thelonious Monk International Jazz Saxophone Competition]] behind [[Joshua Redman]] and ahead of [[Chris Potter (jazz saxophonist)|Chris Potter]] and [[Tim Warfield]], he was soon signed by a record label and has since recorded over 20 albums as a leader and over 300 as a sideman.
